sentences.en: A doctor is there to treat and to cure, not to dismiss anyone as a hopeless case.
sentences.cn: 医生的职责是治病救人，任何人都不能被看作是无药可救而打发走。

sentences.en: At first she threatened to dismiss me, but later she relented.
sentences.cn: 起初她威胁要解雇我, 但后来她态度软化了.

sentences.en: Bethink ere thou dismiss us.
sentences.cn: 在你打发我们走以前再请仔细考虑一下吧.

sentences.en: Bryant was unfairly dismissed from his post.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩特被无理免职了。

sentences.en: Employees can be dismissed for sending obscene emails.
sentences.cn: 员工发送淫秽电子邮件会遭到解雇。

sentences.en: He just laughed and dismissed my proposal as unrealistic.
sentences.cn: 他只是笑了笑，认为我的建议不切实际，拒绝考虑。

sentences.en: I think we can safely dismiss their objections.
sentences.cn: 我认为我们对他们的异议完全可以不予理会。

sentences.en: I wouldn't dismiss it out of hand.
sentences.cn: 我不会不假思索地摈弃它。

sentences.en: In consequence of your bad work I am forced to dismiss you.
sentences.cn: 由于你的工作很糟,我不得不把你解雇.

sentences.en: In fact he could not dismiss his vision of the two Nachmans.
sentences.cn: 真的,他的脑子里老摆不脱两个纳克曼的影子.

sentences.en: It's not feasible to dismiss him.
sentences.cn: 不可开除他.

sentences.en: Most orthodox doctors however dismiss this as complete nonsense.
sentences.cn: 但大多数传统的医生认为此说法完全是胡说八道。

sentences.en: Please dismiss all doubts about it.
sentences.cn: 请打消对此事的一切顾虑.

sentences.en: She tried to dismiss him from her mind.
sentences.cn: 她试图把他忘掉.

sentences.en: The class was dismissed early today.
sentences.cn: 今天这个班级提早放学。

sentences.en: The committee has [ have ] decided to dismiss him.
sentences.cn: 委员会已决定辞退他.

sentences.en: The committee has decided to dismiss him.
sentences.cn: 委员会已决定辞退他。

sentences.en: The government has dismissed criticisms that the country’s health policy is a mess.
sentences.cn: 有人认为国家医疗政策一塌糊涂，政府对这种批评持否认态度。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister has the power to dismiss and appoint senior ministers.
sentences.cn: 首相有权任免高级部长。

sentences.en: They were quick to dismiss rumours of an off-screen romance.
sentences.cn: 他们迅速否认了两人在现实生活中是情侣关系的传言。

trans.tran_cn: 不考虑，解雇，解散，不予受理，（使击球员或球队）出局
trans.tran_en: to remove someone from their job

trans.tran_cn: 不再考虑； 解雇， 解散； 驳回
trans.tran_en: to remove someone from their job
